search.query: | rest /servicesNS/-/ThreatHunting/saved/searches | search title="[T*]*" | rex field=search "mitre_technique_id=\"(?<id>[T0-9\.]*)\"" | rex field=search "mitre_technique=\"(?<mitre_technique>[a-zA-Z\s]*)\"" | rex field=search "mitre_category=\"(?<mitre_category>[a-zA-Z_,]*)\"" | makemv delim="," mitre_category | mvexpand mitre_category | stats count by mitre_category

| inputlookup techniques.csv | eval tag="csv" | append [| rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/-/ThreatHunting/saved/searches | rex field=title "(?<ID>T[0-9]{4})" | regex ID=T\d+ | rename action.summary_index.mitre_category AS ta | makemv delim="," ta | mvexpand ta | eval tag="rest" | eval Tactics=case(like(ta, "Initial_Access"), "Initial Access", like( ta, "Execution"), "Execution", like( ta, "Persistence"), "Persistence", like( ta, "Privilege_Escalation"), "Privilege Escalation", like( ta, "Defense_Evasion"), "Defense Evasion", like( ta, "Credential_Access"), "Credential Access", like( ta, "Discovery"), "Discovery", like( ta, "Lateral_Movement"), "Lateral Movement", like( ta, "Collection"), "Collection", like( ta, "Exfiltration"), "Exfiltration", like( ta, "Command_and_Control"), "Command And Control")] | stats count(eval(tag=="csv")) as csv count(eval(tag=="rest")) as rest list(Technique) as Technique by ID Tactics | eval Status=if((rest>0), "1", "0") | where rest >0 | eval Technique_Status=rest." - ".Technique | stats list(Technique_Status) by Tactics | transpose 0 header_field=Tactics | table "Initial Access" "Execution" "Persistence" "Privilege Escalation" "Defense Evasion" "Credential Access" "Discovery" "Lateral Movement" "Collection" "Command And Control" "Exfiltration" "Impact"

| rest /servicesNS/-/ThreatHunting/saved/searches | search title="[T*]*" | rex field=search "mitre_technique_id=\"(?<id>[T0-9\.]*)\"" | rex field=search "mitre_technique=\"(?<mitre_technique>[a-zA-Z\s]*)\"" | rex field=search "mitre_category=\"(?<mitre_category>[a-zA-Z_,]*)\"" | rename mitre_category as "MITRE Category" mitre_technique as "MITRE Technique" hunting_trigger as "Hunting Trigger" | table title "MITRE Category" "MITRE Technique" "Hunting Trigger"
